docs.lead_paragraph: Dozens of cases attributed to intravenous drug use in a southeastern Indiana county led Gov. Mike Pence to declare a state of emergency.

headline.main: Needle Exchange Is Allowed After H.I.V. Outbreak in an Indiana County
headline.print_headline: Needle Exchange Is Allowed After H.I.V. Outbreak in an Indiana County

docs.abstract: Indiana Gov Mike Pence declares public health emergency following outbreak of HIV in state's southeastern region; authorizes short-term needle exchange program despite long opposition to such policy; officials have traced 71 new cases of HIV since mid-December 2014 to intravenous use of prescription painkiller.
docs.snippet: Dozens of cases attributed to intravenous drug use in a southeastern Indiana county led Gov. Mike Pence to declare a state of emergency.

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By ALAN SCHWARZ and MITCH SMITH

docs.lead_paragraph: The Congressional Budget Office released figures showing that the sweeping changes could add more than $140 billion to federal budget deficits in the coming decade.

headline.main: House Leaders Confident of Passing Medicare Bill
headline.print_headline: House Leaders Confident of Passing Medicare Bill

docs.abstract: House leaders of both parties are confident of passing bill with sweeping changes in Medicare; Congressional Budget Office says measure could add more than $140 billion to federal budget deficits in next decade.
docs.snippet: The Congressional Budget Office released figures showing that the sweeping changes could add more than $140 billion to federal budget deficits in the coming decade.

byline.original: By ROBERT PEAR and JENNIFER STEINHAUER

docs.lead_paragraph: Scientific research into the appropriate uses of medical marijuana has lagged. Dr. Mark Ware would like to change that.

headline.main: Seeking the Facts on Medical Marijuana
headline.print_headline: Seeking the Facts on Medical Marijuana

docs.abstract: Interview with Dr Mark Ware, director of Canadian Consortium for the Investigation of Cannabinoids and director of clinical research of Alan Edwards Pain Management Unit of McGill University Health Center; Ware is seeking to expand research into marijuana's medical uses.
docs.snippet: Scientific research into the appropriate uses of medical marijuana has lagged. Dr. Mark Ware would like to change that.

docs.lead_paragraph: Biogen Idec Inc has seen its market value quadruple in three years to more than $100 billion on the back of its successful multiple sclerosis drugs. Now it has new ambitions in its sights.

headline.main: Exclusive: Biogen Shortens Name, Expands Ambitions in Alzheimer's, ALS
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Biogen Shortens Name, Expands Ambitions in Alzheimer's, ALS
